additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The story 'A Hundred Per Cent' by H. C. McNeile, published in the December 1926 issue of The Strand, also has a US copyright registration dated 1927. We are not sure that this is still in force, but mention it here for completeness.
